mapper.insert: insert into room (rno,userid, roomname, location, imgname1,imgname2,imgname3,imgname4,imgname5, presentation1,presentation2,presentation3) values(room_rno_seq.nextval, #{userid},#{roomname},#{location},#{imgname1},#{imgname2},#{imgname3},#{imgname4},#{imgname5}, #{presentation1}, #{presentation2}, #{presentation3})
mapper.select: select roomname from room where userid =#{userid}

select * from ( select rownum rn, RNO, USERID, ROOMNAME, LOCATION, GRADE,REGDATE from room where
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
select count(*) from room where rno > 0
mapper.update: update room set roomname =#{roomname},location =#{location}, imgname1 = #{imgname1},imgname2 = #{imgname2},imgname3 = #{imgname3},imgname4 = #{imgname4}, imgname5 = #{imgname5},presentation1 = #{presentation1},presentation2 = #{presentation2},presentation3 = #{presentation3}, udate = sysdate where rno =#{rno}
